description: IRA RIFKIN is an award-winning religion journalist who has been honored by the Associated Church Press, the Religion Newswriters Association, the American Jewish Press Association, and the Society of Professional Journalists. He was formerly news producer at Beliefnet.com, a multi-faith Web magazine, and a national correspondent for Religion News Service.
